body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Hotel Haven customer support. My name is Jesse Coleman. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Martha. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am feeling frustrated because there was an issue during my checkout.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Martha. To better assist you, could you please provide me with your room number and the date of your checkout?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My room number was four six two and I checked out on two five zero two zero two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Martha. I will look into the matter for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Martha. Thank you for your time. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all. Thank you again for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It was my pleasure assisting you, Martha. Have a great day!
